name: undigestible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of food or parts of food) not able to be changed in your stomach into substances that your body can use: The hot water can draw out and dissolve the otherwise undigestible starches in the beans. Undigestible carbohydrates stimulate the growth of bacteria in the colon.
More examplesFewer examplesThe basic functions of the large intestine are to remove water, compact undigestible material, and prepare waste for elimination from the body.The horse grinds the high fibre using specialized teeth for the coarse feed, and this allows for a more rapid transit for undigestible plant structures through the alimentary tract.
